title: A Pair Of Approaching Storms Promise Hawaii A 1-2 Drench
teaser: The National Weather Service is forecasting that for the first time in 22 years, Hawaii will be hit directly by a hurricane â€” two, in fact. Hurricane Iselle is expected to make landfall soon, and Hurricane Julio is right on its tail.
